EXPERIENCE.title: Full Stack Developer
EXPERIENCE.company: E-commerce Polo Store Project - Lima, Peru
EXPERIENCE.description: Full stack development of a complete e-commerce platform with payment gateway, shopping cart, JWT authentication, admin panel, review system, image upload, notifications, and inventory management.

EXPERIENCE.title: Video Game Developer
EXPERIENCE.description: Development of top-down 2D video game with Unity in collaboration with international team using agile methodologies. Weekly coordination with international client and optimization for PC and mobile platforms.

EXPERIENCE.title: Full Stack Career
EXPERIENCE.description: Completed Full Stack career with intensive training in Frontend (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+, React) and Backend (Node.js, Express, databases). Developed practical e-commerce projects and web applications. As a self-taught learner, expanded knowledge in NestJS, TypeScript, DevOps, video games, and production projects.

Presentacion.subtitle: Programmer Full Stack
Presentacion.description: Full stack web developer with experience in web application design and development using front-end and back-end technologies. Expert in creating interactive and functional solutions.

Sobremi.subsobre: years of experience programming web pages and creating interesting web pages.

descripcion.1: Hello! I'm Edu, a Full Stack Developer with real experience in productive e-commerce projects, modern web applications, and 2D video games. My profile combines solid frontend, scalable backend, and a business- and end-user-oriented mindset.
descripcion.2: I have led full stack projects from concept to production deployment, working with technologies such as React, TypeScript, Node.js, NestJS, and MongoDB. I specialize in building complete systems that include authentication, payment gateways, administrative panels, real-time notifications, and complex data management.
descripcion.3: In addition, I have experience working in international teams using agile methodologies, quickly adapting to new environments, tools, and challenges. I am passionate about automation, continuous improvement, and creating digital products that truly add value to users and businesses.

Mishabilidades.description: Technologies I master and use in my projects

PROYECTOS.name: ArmalyTech Website
PROYECTOS.description: A website dedicated to cell phone repair and other technical services, offering direct contact with the technician.

PROYECTOS.name: Polo Ecommerce - Complete System
PROYECTOS.description: Complete ecommerce platform for polo sales with administration system, real-time notifications, Tupay payment gateway, order management and customizable landing page. Includes multiple authentication (Google, normal users and administrators), shopping cart, Facebook-style notification system and complete administrative panel.
PROYECTOS.alt: Complete ecommerce system for polo sales

PROYECTOS.name: Lords of Memes and Magic 2.0
PROYECTOS.description: Project developed for the bonsai.meme community. 2D Unity game that combined construction, exploration and battle mechanics with integration to its own cryptocurrency. Although the project remained a prototype due to lack of budget and closure of the crypto initiative, it allowed implementing tilemap systems, resource management, animations and UI in Unity.
PROYECTOS.alt: Lords of Memes and Magic 2.0 screenshot
